description: RNA and DNA secondary structure prediction using nearest neighbor thermodynamic rules
publications: M. Zuker, D.H. Mathews and D.H. Turner Algorithms and Thermodynamics for RNA Secondary Structure Prediction: A Practical Guide in RNA Biochemistry and Biotechnology, J. Barciszewski and B.F.C. Clark, eds., NATO ASI Series, Kluwer Academic Publishers, (1999)
name: mfold
